程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim

类 NetworkTopology

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.NetworkTopology
public class NetworkTopology
extends java.lang.Object
Implements the network layer in CloudSim. It reads a file in the BRITE format, the Boston university Representative Topology gEnerator, and generates a topological network from it. Information of this network is used to simulate latency in network traffic of CloudSim.

The topology file may contain more nodes than the number of entities in the simulation. It allows users to increase the scale of the simulation without changing the topology file. Nevertheless, each CloudSim entity must be mapped to one (and only one) BRITE node to allow proper work of the network simulation. Each BRITE node can be mapped to only one entity at a time.

从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0

  • 字段概要

    字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    protected static double[][] bwMatrix
    A matrix containing the bandwidth between every pair of nodes in the network.
    protected static DelayMatrix_Float delayMatrix
    A matrix containing the delay between every pair of nodes in the network.
    protected static TopologicalGraph graph
    The Topological Graph of the network.
    protected static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> map
    The map between CloudSim entities and BRITE entities.
    protected static int nextIdx
    The BRITE id to use for the next node to be created in the network.

  • 字段详细资料

    • nextIdx

      protected static int nextIdx
      The BRITE id to use for the next node to be created in the network.

    • delayMatrix

      protected static DelayMatrix_Float delayMatrix
      A matrix containing the delay between every pair of nodes in the network.

    • bwMatrix

      protected static double[][] bwMatrix
      A matrix containing the bandwidth between every pair of nodes in the network.

    • graph

      protected static TopologicalGraph graph
      The Topological Graph of the network.

    • map

      protected static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> map
      The map between CloudSim entities and BRITE entities. Each key is a CloudSim entity ID and each value the corresponding BRITE entity ID.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • NetworkTopology

      public NetworkTopology()

  • 方法详细资料

    • buildNetworkTopology

      public static void buildNetworkTopology​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates the network topology if the file exists and can be successfully parsed. File is written in the BRITE format and contains topological information on simulation entities.
      参数:
      fileName - name of the BRITE file

    • addLink

      public static void addLink​(int srcId, int destId, double bw, double lat)
      Adds a new link in the network topology. The CloudSim entities that represent the source and destination of the link will be mapped to BRITE entities.
      参数:
      srcId - ID of the CloudSim entity that represents the link's source node
      destId - ID of the CloudSim entity that represents the link's destination node
      bw - Link's bandwidth
      lat - link's latency

    • mapNode

      public static void mapNode​(int cloudSimEntityID, int briteID)
      Maps a CloudSim entity to a BRITE node in the network topology.
      参数:
      cloudSimEntityID - ID of the entity being mapped
      briteID - ID of the BRITE node that corresponds to the CloudSim entity

    • unmapNode

      public static void unmapNode​(int cloudSimEntityID)
      Unmaps a previously mapped CloudSim entity to a BRITE node in the network topology.
      参数:
      cloudSimEntityID - ID of the entity being unmapped

    • getDelay

      public static double getDelay​(int srcID, int destID)
      Calculates the delay between two nodes.
      参数:
      srcID - ID of the CloudSim entity that represents the link's source node
      destID - ID of the CloudSim entity that represents the link's destination node
      返回:
      communication delay between the two nodes

    • isNetworkEnabled

      public static boolean isNetworkEnabled()
      Checks if the network simulation is working. If there were some problem during creation of network (e.g., during parsing of BRITE file) that does not allow a proper simulation of the network, this method returns false.
      返回:
      $true if network simulation is working, $false otherwise
